channel.title: composed retrieval on Jonathan`s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in composed retrieval on Jonathan`s Blog

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 跨模态检索] Composed IR via Explicit Erasure and Replenishment(TIP 2022)
item.description: Composed Image Retrieval via Explicit Erasure and Replenishment With Semantic Alignment (TIP 2022) 概述 Composed Image Retrieval (CIR) 任务。 本文将 CIR 任务分为两个显式的子过程： 删去参考图像中不符合用户需求的细节 补充包含用户需求的文本细节 本
